TestDescription.name: Apache Roller OGNL injection
TestDescription.Description: Apache Roller is a full-featured, multi-user and group-blog server suitable for blog sites large and small. It runs as a Java web application that should be able to run on most any Java EE server and relational database. [break][break] Roller version 5 earlier than 5.0.2 and all of version 4 are vulnerable to a pre-authenticated OGNL injection that can result in remote code execution (RCE).
TestDescription.Impact: Remote OGNL injection leads to arbitrary Java method execution on the target server.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Roller (the problem was fixed in version 5.0.2).

Reference.database: Remote Code Execution in Apache Roller via OGNL Injection
